ygData.subject: Re: Singing Strategy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think this is one of the reasons I decided against playing a cleric.  While being almost completely devoted to helping other players is nice, I didn t
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> Uhm - the point of the thread was "how to spread damage more equally among
> the group" -- so instead of "telling" the war/ranger/wiz "how to play his
> class" (even the most tactful suggestions may not be well received) why not
> try asking him to think up a solution to the group's problem? Ie: if he's
> such a good ranger/war/wiz, let him think up the way to spread the damage
> around.

I think this is one of the reasons I decided against playing a
cleric. While being almost completely devoted to helping
other players is nice, I didn't want to be blamed for other
people's stupidity. "I died! Why didn't you heal me?" when
everyone else was at full hp and he wouldn't back off the mob
beating him up.

> p.s. "Stop chaining damn it! I am darknessing!" "Duh, forgot, sorry"

Has anyone else noticed the point where engulfing darkness
stops a mob from moving is *lower* than the point at which
they start running? So you darkness it, beat it up, it starts
to run, then after a few hits its frozen.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
